phrs.translation: 交羚弧焊机，交流电焊机

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the status of health in the welders.
sentences.translation: 目的调查电焊工人的职业健康状况。

sentences.sentence: EN ISO 287-1 Qualification Test of Welders-Fusion Welding-Part 1: steels.
sentences.translation: EN ISO 287 - 1焊工资质测试—熔焊—第一部分：钢材。

sentences.sentence: The technical school trains mechanicians, welders, shop assistants, seamstresses and hairdressers.
sentences.translation: 技校培养机修工，焊工，店员，裁缝和理发师。
